name: Hydra Attacks
description:
Chop down as many Hydra heads as you can. Two heads grow from each cut head.
Carefully: 
- each Hydra head breathes fire
- you are supposed to throw the sword up, but it can kill you falling down
- pick up sword only when it turns gold

Controls:
- Arrows for moving
- UP to jump
- SPACE to throw the sword

- ENTER to restart
- ESC to close the game
